sound

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sound.SoundManager

  • public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all the sound loading and contains different methods for playing required sounds.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundManager()
      Default constructor, which initialize the hashmap where all the required sounds are stored.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void playExit()
      This method plays the sound of achievement when player finds the exit and completes the current level.
      void playHeartBeat()
      This methods plays the heartbeat of the player.
      void playPlayerDeath()
      This method plays the player death sound.
      void playPlayerFootStep()
      This method plays the footstep sound for the player.
      void playPlayerSound()
      This method plays random voice for the player
      void playSwordHit()
      This method plays the sound of the sword hitting the zombie.
      void playSwordSwing()
      This method plays the sound of sword swinging in the air.
      void playZombieGroan(double distance, double balance)
      This method plays the groaning sound of the Zombie.
      void playZombiePunch()
      This methods plays the sound of Zombie hitting.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundManager

        public SoundManager()
        Default constructor, which initialize the hashmap where all the required sounds are stored. It calls the initializeSound method, which loads all the requires sounds and stor them in a hashMap

    • Method Detail

      • playZombiePunch

        public void playZombiePunch()
        This methods plays the sound of Zombie hitting.

      • playPlayerSound

        public void playPlayerSound()
        This method plays random voice for the player

      • playHeartBeat

        public void playHeartBeat()
        This methods plays the heartbeat of the player.

      • playZombieGroan

        public void playZombieGroan(double distance,
                            double balance)
        This method plays the groaning sound of the Zombie. The volume of groan depends how far is zombie from the player. The sound is played with certain balance in the speakers and balance depends on which direction is the zombie located from the player facing direction.
        Parameters:
        distance -
        balance -

      • playPlayerDeath

        public void playPlayerDeath()
        This method plays the player death sound.

      • playPlayerFootStep

        public void playPlayerFootStep()
        This method plays the footstep sound for the player.

      • playSwordHit

        public void playSwordHit()
        This method plays the sound of the sword hitting the zombie.

      • playSwordSwing

        public void playSwordSwing()
        This method plays the sound of sword swinging in the air.

      • playExit

        public void playExit()
        This method plays the sound of achievement when player finds the exit and completes the current level.
